Translations.Text: geuga malhagil dangsin-eun gyesileul midneunja jung-e issneunyo
uliga jug-eo heulg-idoego ppyeoman namneundedo bosang-gwa beol-eul badneundan mal inyo
ittae yeoleobun-i naelyeoda bogo sip-eungayo laneun han eumseong-i deullyeowa
geuga naelyeowa bogo jiog-e issneun geu chinguleul balgyeonhagoseo
geuga malhagil hananimkke maengse hanani neoneun naleul myeolmang-eulo yuhog halyeo haessnola
nae junim-ui eunhyega eobs-eossdeondeul sillo naneun geugos-e kkeullyeoon jajung-e iss-eoss-eulila
uliga jugji anihal geos-ila neun geos-eun geuwa gatji anhneunyo
uliga hanbeon jug-eumyeon beol-eul badji anihal geos-ila saeng-gaghaessneunyo
sillo igeos-eun choehuui seunglila
ileohan geoss-eul wihayeo modeun ingan-eun nolyeoghaeya doenila
geuwa gat-eun hwandaega deo na-eunyo animyeon jakkumu namuga deo na-eunyo
hananim-eun joeindeul-eul wihan si heom-eulo geugeos-eul dueossnola
geugeos-eun buljiog-ui mitbadag-eseo jalaneun namulo
yeolmaeleul maejneun saessag-eun satan-ui udumeolideulgwa gat-euni
geudeul-eun geugeos-eul meog-eo baeleul chaeumyeo
geu wie igeulgeolineun mul-i deo hayeo chaewojigo
geudeul-eun taoleuneun buljiog-eulo hyanghanila
geudeul-eun banghwanghaneun geudeul-ui seon jodeul-eul balgyeonhago
seodulleo geudeul-ui baljachwileul tta lassnola
geudeul ijeon-ui manh-eun seonjodeuldo banghwanghago iss-eossdeola
hananim-i geudeul gaunde han seonjijaleul bonaeeo geudeul-eul chung-gohadolog hayeoss-euni
gyeong-goleul badgodo juuihaji a nihan ideul-ui jongmal-i eotteo haessdeonyo
geuleona hananim-ui seongsilhan jong deul-eun je-oela
noaga hananim-ege guwonhaess-eulttae hananim-i geuui gido-e eunghasa
keun jaeang-eulobuteo geuwa geuuigajog-eul guhago
